metadata.title: CVE-2023-52646 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:aio: fix mremap after fork null-derefCommit e4a0d3e720e7 ("aio: Make it possible to remap aio ring") introduceda null-deref if mremap is called on an old aio mapping after fork asmm->ioctx_table will be set to NULL.[jmoyer@redhat.com: fix 80 column issue]

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
